lines.text: Suggest solutions for the over-population problem.
If Jacob dies of this cyanide poisoning, I roast him and feed it to him for dinner.
I watch a man's table manners because that's the way he'll be in bed, too.
Good gracious, that's awful. I wouldn't dare have dinner with you. I'd be afraid of using the wrong fork for the soup or dipping my collar in the wrong bowl.
That depends entirely on your sense of humor.
